item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

April 2, 2012's location is:

Cask Republic

Cask Republic is a Beer Bar with German influences on it's menu.  Located on Crown Street next to the Wine Thief and across from the Temple Street Parking Garage, They have FIFTY THREE beers on tap and 80+ bottled beers, quite the selection!

Cask will only be offering whatever specials they have decided to run for any customer on the day.

Their selection is constantly changing, but most of their beers run $5-8. 

They also offer a fully stocked bar for more options.

ATTENTION: As some of you may know, Meetup does charge the Leadership twice a year for hosting the website. We do not pass this fee along in any mandatory way, however we will take donations at upcomming Happy Hours. Anything you can give towards defraying this cost to keeping the group going will be appreciated!  Please see AJ, Devorah, or Jason at an April Happy hour Thanks!

AJ will host this happy hour and can be reached at 315-345-9348 should you have difficulties.

Please RSVP, for Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and/or we're most likely one of the largest groups at the Bar on a Monday.
